statements.select:
SELECT AA.ID , AA.CUSTOMER_ID , AA.ADDRESS_TYPE , AA.REMARKS , AA.ADDRESS_ID , AD.POST_NO , AD.ZONE_NO , AD.ADDRESS1 , AD.ADDRESS2
, AA.INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , AA.UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME
FROM jwm.CustomerAddress AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN jwm.Address AD ON AA.ADDRESS_ID = AD.ID LEFT JOIN jwa.Users U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.INS_USER = U1.ID LEFT JOIN jwa.Users U2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.CUSTOMER_ID = #CUSTOMER_ID#
AND AA.ID = #ID#
ORDER BY AA.ID DESC
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO jwm.CustomerAddress ( CUSTOMER_ID, ADDRESS_ID, ADDRESS_TYPE, REMARKS, INS_TIME, INS_USER ) VALUES ( #CUSTOMER_ID#, #ADDRESS_ID#, #ADDRESS_TYPE#, #REMARKS#, GETDATE(), #INS_USER# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update: UPDATE jwm.CustomerAddress SET ADDRESS_ID = #ADDRESS_ID# , ADDRESS_TYPE= #ADDRESS_TYPE# , REMARKS = #REMARKS# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE ID = #ID#
